imdb.plot outline: It is the new millennium. Digital war is outlawed. In Asia are matches between large small Robots called Mecha toys. These Action Figures take place between two large powerful over disputed homelands at John's house and for this reason he gonna animate them for win the battle. But many heroes are coming too. The main character Gundam is a Japanese Robot and the others toys are the Transformers from US and all action toys from Anime and Videogames.
imdb.title: Action Figure
plot: It is the new millennium. Digital war is outlawed. In Asia are matches between large small Robots called Mecha toys. These _Action Figure_ (qv)s take place between two large powerful over disputed homelands at John's house in Stop Motion.::Written by Anonymous
